# include<iostream>
#include<fstream>
#include<string>
#include<cstring>
#include<math.h>
#include<cmath>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>
 
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
    //ifstream infile;
    //infile.open("test.txt");
    int t;
    //infile>>t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        //infile>>n;
        cin>>n;
        int a[n];
        for(int i = 0;i<n;i++)
        {
            //infile>>a[i];
            cin>>a[i];
        }
        sort(a,a+n);
        int num = a[0],cou = 1,num1 = a[0],cou1 = 0;
        for(int j = 0;j<n;j++)
        {
            if(a[j] == num1)
                {
                    cou1++;
                }
            else{
                if(cou1 > cou) {num = num1;cou = cou1;}
                if(cou == cou1)
                    {
                        if(num1 < num){num = num1;}
 
                    }
                num1 = a[j];
                cou1 = 1;
                }
 
        }
        if(cou1 > cou) {num = num1;cou = cou1;}
                if(cou == cou1)
                    {
                        if(num1 < num){num = num1;}
 
                    }
        cout<<num<<" "<<cou<<endl;
 
    }
    return 0;
}
